Brian Naja

A Simple Responsive CSS Grid

  1 * { 
  2     -moz-box-sizing: border-box; 
  3     -webkit-box-sizing: border-box; 
  4     box-sizing: border-box; 
  5 }
  6   
  7  .row { 
  8     width: 1000px; 
  9     max-width: 100%; 
 10     min-width: 768px; 
 11     margin: 0 auto; 
 12 }
 13 
 14 .column, .columns { 
 15     float: left; 
 16     min-height: 1px; 
 17     padding: 0 15px; 
 18     position: relative; 
 19 }
 20 
 21 [class*="column"] + [class*="column"]:last-child { 
 22     float: right; 
 23 }
 24 
 25 [class*="column"] + [class*="column"].end { 
 26     float: left;
 27 }
 28   
 29 .row .one { 
 30     width: 8.33%; 
 31 }
 32 
 33 .row .two { 
 34     width: 16.66%; 
 35 }
 36 
 37 .row .three { 
 38     width: 25%;
 39 }
 40 
 41 .row .four {
 42      width: 33.33%;
 43 }
 44 
 45 .row .five {
 46  width: 41.66%; 
 47 }
 48 
 49 .row .six { 
 50     width: 50%; 
 51 }
 52 
 53 .row .seven { 
 54     width: 58.33%; 
 55 }
 56 
 57 .row .eight { 
 58     width: 66.66%; 
 59 }
 60 
 61 .row .nine { 
 62     width: 75%; 
 63 }
 64 
 65 .row .ten { 
 66     width: 83.33%; 
 67 }
 68 
 69 .row .eleven { 
 70     width: 91.66% ;
 71 }
 72 
 73 .row .twelve { 
 74     width: 100%; 
 75 }
 76 
 77 .centered { 
 78     float: none; 
 79     margin: 0 auto; 
 80 }
 81   
 82 .row:before, .row:after, .clearfix:before, .clearfix:after { /*clearfix */
 83     content:""; 
 84     display: table; 
 85 }
 86 
 87 .row:after, .clearfix:after { 
 88     clear: both; 
 89 }
 90 
 91 .row, .clearfix {
 92      zoom: 1; 
 93 }  
 94   
 95   /* !Mobile */
 96 @media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {      
 97   body { 
 98     -webkit-text-size-adjust: none; 
 99       -ms-text-size-adjust: none; 
100       width: 100%; 
101       min-width: 0; 
102       margin-left: 0; 
103       margin-right: 0; 
104       padding-left: 0; 
105       padding-right: 0; 
106   }
107       
108   .row { 
109     width: auto; 
110     min-width: 0; 
111     margin-left: 0; 
112     margin-right: 0;
113   }
114       
115   .column, .columns {
116      width: auto !important; 
117      float: none; 
118   }
119   
120   .column:last-child, .columns:last-child { 
121     float: none; 
122   }
123   
124   [class*="column"] + [class*="column"]:last-child { 
125     float: none; 
126   }
127   
128   .column:before, .columns:before, .column:after, .columns:after { 
129     content:""; 
130     display:table; 
131   }
132   
133   .column:after, .columns:after { 
134   clear: both; 
135   }
136 }
